Commands
====================================

DJ
*****************

Commands
-----------------


+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Command name |        Aliases         |      Usages       |                                           Description                                            |
+==============+========================+===================+==================================================================================================+
| pause        | None                   | None              | Pauses the current music                                                                         |
+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| play         | sc_p                   | <link>|<Title>    | Plays a link or title from a SoundCloud song. It can also play attachments. (supports playlists) |
+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| playlist     | queue, list            | (position)        | Displays the information for the music in the playlist or for a particular one                   |
+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| skip         | next                   | (number of skips) | Skips the music a given number of times                                                          |
+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| stop         | end, leave, disconnect | None              | Stops the music in progress                                                                      |
+--------------+------------------------+-------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+


Miscellaneous
*****************

Commands
-----------------


+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
|   Command name   |     Aliases     |    Usages     |                     Description                       |
+==================+=================+===============+=======================================================+
| help             | h, halp         | (command)     | Shows every bot command or infos about a specific one |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| ping             | latency         | None          | Checks the bot latency                                |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| serverinfo       | si, serverinfos | None          | Gets information about the current server             |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| uptime           | up, time        | None          | Shows how long the bot has been connected             |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| userinfo         | ui, userinfos   | (@member)     | Gets the information from a member or from yourself   |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) activity | activities      | (sub-command) | Manages the server's activities                       |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) xp       | stat            | (sub-command) | Contains every xp related commands                    |
+------------------+-----------------+---------------+-------------------------------------------------------+


Group(s)
-----------------

* **activity**
    **activity commands**
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |   Command name   |      Aliases      |             Usages              |                                          Description                                           |
        +==================+===================+=================================+================================================================================================+
        | awkword          | awkw              | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity awkword in the specified channel              |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | betrayal_io      | b_io              | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Betrayal.io in the specified channel          |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | checkers         | chkrs             | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Checkers In The Park in the specified channel |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | chess            | chess_in_the_park | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Chess In The Park in the specified channel    |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | custom           | cstm              | #voice_channel <application_id> | Creates an instant invite link into a custom activity in the specified channel                 |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | doodle_crew      | d_crew            | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Doodle Crew in the specified channel          |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | fishington_io    | f_io              | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Fishington.io in the specified channel        |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | letter_tile      | l_tile            | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Letter Tile in the specified channel          |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | poker_night      | p_n               | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Poker Night in the specified channel          |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | sketchy_artist   | s_a               | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Sketchy Artist in the specified channel       |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | spellcast        | spell             | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Spellcast in the specified channel            |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | watch_together   | w_t               | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity WatchTogether in the specified channel        |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | word_snack       | w_snack           | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity Word Snack in the specified channel           |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | youtube_together | yt_together, ytt  | #voice_channel                  | Creates an instant invite link into the activity YouTube Together in the specified channel     |
        +------------------+-------------------+---------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

* **xp**
    **xp commands**
        +--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | Command name |   Aliases    |                  Usages                   |                                                      Description                                                        |
        +==============+==============+===========================================+=========================================================================================================================+
        | info         | infos        | (@member)                                 | Displays the current level and the number of xp remaining before the next level for yourself or someone on the server   |
        +--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | leaderboard  | ranking, top | (me) (all)                                | Displays the top 10 members of the server or your own rank (possibility to display the rank of the moderators with all) |
        +--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | levels       | lvl, lvls    | add|set|remove @member <number of levels> | Manages a member's levels                                                                                               |
        +--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | prestige     | prstg        | None                                      | Allows you to create a prestige level passage procedure (one procedure at a time, server's max level required)          |
        +--------------+--------------+-------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+


Moderation
*****************

Commands
-----------------


+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|   Command name   |          Aliases           |             Usages             |                                                Description                                                 |
+==================+============================+================================+============================================================================================================+
| clear            | delete                     | <number of messages> (@member) | Deletes a given number of messages in the channel from everyone or a certain member (99 max) (default: 10) |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| endticket        | et                         | None                           | Creates a procedure to delete a ticket. (can only be used in a ticket channel)                             |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| say              | acc, announcement, talk    | (#channel) "message"           | Sends a message to a specified salon or the current one                                                    |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) config   | cfg                        | (sub-command)                  | Manages the server's configuration                                                                         |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) poll     | polls                      | (sub-command)                  | Manages the server's polls                                                                                 |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) sanction | sanctions, strike, strikes | (sub-command)                  | Manages the server's sanctions                                                                             |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| (Group) stats    | stat                       | (sub-command)                  | Manages the server's stats                                                                                 |
+------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+


Group(s)
-----------------

* **config**
    **config commands**
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |   Command name   |          Aliases           |                     Usages                      |                                                                    Description                                                         |
        +==================+============================+=================================================+========================================================================================================================================+
        | djs              | players                    | (add|remove|purge @role|@member)                | Manages the server's djs (role & members) (if there is no dj then everyone can use music commands) (can add/remove multiple at a time) |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | moderators       | mods                       | (add|remove|purge @role|@member)                | Manages the server's moderators (role & members) (can add/remove multiple at a time)                                                   |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | muted_role       | mute_role                  | (set|remove @role)                              | Manages the server's muted role                                                                                                        |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | prefix           | prfx                       | (set|reset) (<prefix>)                          | Manages the server's prefix                                                                                                            |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | select_to_role   | select_2_role, select2role | (add|update|resolve|remove|purge "Title" @role) | Manages the server's server_2_role feature                                                                                             |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | tickets          | ticket                     | (on|update|resolve|off) (#channel) (#category)  | Manages the server's tickets channel and category                                                                                      |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) channels | channel                    | (sub-command)                                   | Manages the server's special channels                                                                                                  |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) security | secu                       | (sub-command)                                   | Manages the server's security                                                                                                          |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) xp       | experience                 | (sub-command)                                   | Manages the server's experience feature                                                                                                |
        +------------------+----------------------------+-------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

    **config groups**
        * **channels commands** (you can add/remove multiple channels at a time)
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            |      Command name      |                    Aliases                    |                       Usages                        |                                                            Description                                                  |
            +========================+===============================================+=====================================================+=========================================================================================================================+
            | commands_channels      | command_channels, command_channel, cmds_chans | (add|remove|purge (#channel))                       | Manages the server's commands channels (if there is no commands channel then commands can be used everywhere)           |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | games_category         | game_category                                 | (set|remove #category)                              | Manages the server's games category where all the game channels are created                                             |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | mods_channel           | mod_channel                                   | (set|remove #channel)                               | Manages the server's mods channel where all the error messages and other information are sent                           |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | music_channels         | music_channel, music_chans                    | (add|remove|purge (#voice_channel))                 | Manages the server's music channels (if there is no music channel then music can be listened everywhere)                |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | polls_channel          | polls_chan                                    | (set|remove #channel)                               | Manages the server's polls channel where every polls created will be sent                                               |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | select_to_role_channel | select2role_channel                           | (set|remove #channel)                               | Manages the server's select 2 role channels where the select to role message is sent                                    |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | xp_channel             | xp_chan                                       | (set|remove #channel)                               | Manages the server's xp channels where every xp event is sent                                                           |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | xp_gain_channels       | xp_gain_channel                               | (add|remove|purge (#voice_channels|#text_channels)) | Manages the server's xp gain channels (voice & text) (if there is no xp gain channels then xp can be gained everywhere) |
            +------------------------+-----------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

        * **security commands**
            +-----------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            |  Command name   | Aliases |                           Usages                            |                                                                                                                            Description                                                                                                                 |
            
            | mute_on_join    | m_on_j  | (on|update|off) (<duration_value> <duration_type> #channel) | Manages if users are muted during a certain amount of time when joining the server and then notify it at the end if a channel is specified (default duration = 10 min) (duration format -> <duration value (more than 0)> <duration type (d, h, m, s)> |
            +-----------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | prevent_invites | prev_i  | (on|update|off) (#channel)                                  | Manages if users are allowed to send other servers invites or not (specify a channel to be notified when someone tries to send an invitation link)                                                                                                     |
            +-----------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

        * **xp commands**
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | Command name  |                   Aliases                    |                      Usages                       |                                                    Description                                          |
            +===============+==============================================+===================================================+=========================================================================================================+
            | boost         | boosts, boosted, boosteds                    | (add|update|remove|purge @role|@member (<bonus>)) | Manages the server's boosted roles | members, you can precise what xp bonus they'll get (default = 20%) |
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | level_to_role | level_2_role, lvl_to_role, lvl_2_role, l_2_r | (add|update|remove|purge <level value> @role)     | Manages the server's level to role                                                                      |
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | max_lvl       | mx_lvl                                       | (<number of levels>)                              | Manages the server's max level                                                                          |
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | prestiges     | prestg, prestige                             | (add|update|remove|purge @role <prestige_value>)  | Manages the server's prestiges                                                                          |
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | state         | None                                         | (on|off)                                          | Turns the server's experience feature on or off                                                         |
            +---------------+----------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

* **poll**
    **poll commands**
        +--------------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | Command name |   Aliases    |                                                     Usages                                                      |                                                       Description                                                       |
        +==============+==============+=================================================================================================================+=========================================================================================================================+
        | create       | new          | "title" <duration> <type_of_duration (d == days, h == hours, m == minutes, s == seconds)> choice 1 choice 2 ... | Creates a poll of a specific duration (10 m minimum) (25 choices max)                                                   |
        +--------------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | delete       | del, remove  | <id_of_the_poll_message>                                                                                        | Deletes a poll prematurely (unlike the command end it will erase completely the poll and not just end it)               |
        +--------------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | end          | ends, finish | <id_of_the_poll_message>                                                                                        | Stops a poll prematurely                                                                                                |
        +--------------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | info         | infos        | <id_of_the_poll_message>                                                                                        | Retrieves information from the specified poll (if no identifier is specified then retrieves information from all polls) |
        +--------------+--------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

* **sanction**
    **sanction commands**
        +--------------+---------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | Command name | Aliases |       Usages       |                            Description                             |
        +==============+=========+====================+====================================================================+
        | kick         | None    | @member ("reason") | Kicks a member from the server with a reason attached if specified |
        +--------------+---------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) ban  | bans    | (sub-command)      | Manages the server's bans                                          |
        +--------------+---------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) mute | mutes   | (sub-command)      | Manages the server's mutes                                         |
        +--------------+---------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | (Group) warn | warns   | (sub-command)      | Manages the server's warns                                         |
        +--------------+---------+--------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------+

    **sanction groups**
        * **ban commands**
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | Command name | Aliases |                        Usages                         |                                                                                     Description                                                                                      |
            +==============+=========+=======================================================+======================================================================================================================================================================================+
            | add          | None    | @member ("reason") (<duration_value> <duration_type>) | Bans a member for a certain duration with a reason attached if specified! (minimum duration = 1 day) (duration format -> <duration value (more than 0)> <duration type (d, h, m, s)> |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | list         | None    | (@member)                                             | Lists the bans from the server or for a specific member!                                                                                                                             |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | remove       | None    | @user ("reason")                                      | Unban a user from the server with a reason attached if specified!                                                                                                                    |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

        * **mute commands**
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | Command name | Aliases |                        Usages                         |                                                                                          Description                                                                                           |
            +==============+=========+=======================================================+================================================================================================================================================================================================+
            | add          | None    | @member ("reason") (<duration_value> <duration_type>) | Mutes a member for a certain duration with a reason attached if specified! (default/minimum duration = 10 min) (duration format -> <duration value (more than 0)> <duration type (d, h, m, s)> |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | list         | None    | (@member)                                             | Shows the list of a member's mutes or yours                                                                                                                                                    |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
            | remove       | None    | @member ("reason")                                    | Unmute a member with a reason attached if specified!                                                                                                                                           |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

        * **warn commands**
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+
            | Command name | Aliases |                        Usages                         |                    Description                     |
            +==============+=========+=======================================================+====================================================+
            | add          | None    | @member ("reason") (<duration_value> <duration_type>) | Warns a member with a reason attached if specified |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+
            | clear        | None    | (@member)                                             | Clears the warns of a member!                      |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+
            | list         | None    | (@member)                                             | Shows the list of a member's warns or yours        |
            +--------------+---------+-------------------------------------------------------+----------------------------------------------------+

* **stats**
    **stats commands**
        +------------------+-------------------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |   Command name   |            Aliases            |           Usages           |                                                                Description                                                     |
        +==================+===============================+============================+================================================================================================================================+
        | commands_count   | commands_counts, commands     | (@member) (details)        | Counts the number of commands a member (our yourself) has executed in the server (add details at the end to get the full list) |
        +------------------+-------------------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | members_count    | members_counts, members       | (bots)                     | Counts the members (including bots or not, default is False) in the server!                                                    |
        +------------------+-------------------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | messages_count   | messages_counts, messages     | (@member) (#text_channel)  | Counts every messages (or a member's) sent in this server or in a specific channel                                             |
        +------------------+-------------------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
        | voice_time_count | voice_time_counts, voice_time | (@member) (#voice_channel) | Counts every seconds everyone (or a specific member) has passed inside every voice channels or a specific one                  |
        +------------------+-------------------------------+----------------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
